review: Diagnosed with right knee meniscal tear with knee joint osteoarthritis, and lumbar spondylosis with degenerative arthritis of the spine. Have tried everything, finally my doctor prescribed Diclofenac 75mg twice a day. What a life changer. No side effects, no pain.
Intestinal cramping, severe diarrea, 2 hours after taking.

Went in to anaphylactic shock within 20 minutes of taking first tablet, had to call ambulance. Nearly died,blood pressure dropped to life threatening level. Taken to A & E, given adrenaline injection.
